code: import{Grid,Card,CardContent,Typography,Box}from"@mui/material";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import FitnessCenterIcon from"@mui/icons-material/FitnessCenter";import HealingIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Healing";import AccessibilityNewIcon from"@mui/icons-material/AccessibilityNew";import HomeIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Home";import ElderlyIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Elderly";import DirectionsWalkIcon from"@mui/icons-material/DirectionsWalk";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const services=[{title:"Sports Physiotherapy",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FitnessCenterIcon,{fontSize:"large"})},{title:"Chiropractic Care",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HealingIcon,{fontSize:"large"})},{title:"Neuro Rehabilitation",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccessibilityNewIcon,{fontSize:"large"})},{title:"Home Physiotherapy",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeIcon,{fontSize:"large"})},{title:"Geriatric Care",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ElderlyIcon,{fontSize:"large"})},{title:"Vestibular Therapy",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DirectionsWalkIcon,{fontSize:"large"})}];export default function Services(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{bgcolor:"#f5f7fa",py:6},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",textAlign:"center",fontWeight:"bold",gutterBottom:true,children:"Our Services"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:4,sx:{px:4,mt:2},children:services.map((service,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,sm:6,md:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,y:30},whileInView:{opacity:1,y:0},whileHover:{scale:1.05},transition:{duration:0.5},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{sx:{height:"100%",width:"350px",textAlign:"center",marginLeft:"50px",borderRadius:3,boxShadow:3,py:4,backgroundColor:"primary.light"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{color:"#fff",mb:1},children:service.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",fontWeight:"bold",color:"#fff",children:service.title})]})})})},index))})]});}
